result.title: Land Agreement over 500 ha per year (period M1-M25)
result.description: The land report includes overviews over all agreements signed which secure land for the establishment of fast growing poplar on agricultural land. The report will identify the cooperation partners and the location of the fields, which form part of the respective agreements. The first report will include land agreements signed in the first 24 months of the project (cf. D1.5).

result.title: Training workshops for EPC facilitators
result.description: Analysis report about training workshops for capacity buildings for EPC facilitators. result.title: Biodiversity monitoring: Methodology and preliminary results
result.description:
The report will present the methodology and preliminary results with regards to the floristic, vegetation and zoological changes that are related with the development of the poplar stands in the SRC habitats.
Based on repeated plant species recordings in permanent sample plots and on periodical monitoring of birds, amphibians and invertebrates, the succession of the biocoenoses in selected stands will be outlined. The occurrence of invasive species will be reported if such species are detected in the sample plots.
